bibl.title: The ἀγαθὸς δαίμων Abandons Alexandria. The Potter's Oracle and Possible Roman Allusions.

Ancient History in a Modern University. Proceedings of a Conference Held at Macquarie University, 8-13 July 1993 to mark twenty-five years of the teaching of Ancient History at Macquarie University and the retirement from the Chair of Professor Edwin Judge. I. The Ancient Near East, Greece and Rome

bibl.seg: HILLARD Tom W., The ἀγαθὸς δαίμων Abandons Alexandria. The Potter's Oracle and Possible Roman Allusions.

T.W. HILLARD, R.A. KEARSLEY, C.E.V. NIXON and A.M. NOBBS (Edd.), Ancient History in a Modern University. Proceedings of a Conference Held at Macquarie University, 8-13 July 1993 to mark twenty-five years of the teaching of Ancient History at Macquarie University and the retirement from the Chair of Professor Edwin Judge. I. The Ancient Near East, Greece and Rome (Macquarie University, N.S.W. - Grand Rapids, Michigan - Cambridge, U.K., 1998) pp. 160-172.
